commit.message: just reorder so optimized join implementations are together
pre-compute how to merge left and right sparse address components

nodes.bodyText: this could be static inside HashedLabel since it might also be useful elsewhere
use num_mapped_dims from line above instead of counting dimensions again.

commit.message:
minor refactoring:

* have a static const empty_label in FastSparseMap
  (may be useful more places)
* avoid re-computing num_mapped_dims needlessly
